org.flywaydb.core.api.configuration.Configuration

  • Packages that use Configuration 
    Package Description
    org.flywaydb.core
    The main Flyway package and for most users, the only one they'll ever need to know about.
    org.flywaydb.core.api.callback
    Interfaces for Flyway lifecycle callbacks.
    org.flywaydb.core.api.configuration
    Interfaces for Flyway configuration injection.

      Subinterfaces of Configuration in org.flywaydb.core.api.configuration

      Deprecated. 
      Use Configuration instead. Will be removed in Flyway 6.0.

      Modifier and Type Class Description

      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Constructors in org.flywaydb.core.api.configuration with parameters of type Configuration 
      Constructor Description
